data: Heather | Mrs. Ormson | Bessie | Miss Hope | Mr. Black | Arthur
English cookery | salads | fruit | coffee | chocolate | claret | commercial scheme

Amidst the anxieties of making salads, the desire to convert Heather from the evils and dangers of English cookery, skirmishes with Mrs. Ormson, criticisms on Bessie, and the personal enjoyment of such luxuries as ripe fruit, coffee of her own manufacture, chocolate and claret _ad libitum_, Miss Hope by no means forgot Mr. Blackâ€™s commercial scheme, and the efforts she felt confident he was making to induce Arthur to embark in it with him.
